tutorial.speak:
To create groups in B1 Admin, navigate to the B1 dashboard.
Click on the Groups tab.
Click Add Group and enter a Category Name.
Enter the Group Name.
Click Add. Your new group will appear in the list.
Click on the group name, then click the pencil icon.
Configure the group settings including attendance tracking, meeting times, group description, and service times. Click Save.
Click the Members tab and type a person's name in the search field or leave it blank and you can scroll through everyone in your data base.
Click the Add button next to the person's name.
Your group members are now listed. You can use the icons to manage members. Click the green key to designate someone as the group leader. The group leader is the only one who can edit the group calendar. You can designate more than one person as a group leader if you like
You can send messages to all group members. Type your message and click Send.
To export your group data, click the download icon.
All your church groups are organized by categories.
